title: Silver looking for duo to climb gold.
body: Sick of solo ques with scrubs who just constantly feed despite efforts and being nice its always the same. just looking for someone who can hold there lane and wants to climb to gold. add us :) or comment here

replies.body:
Im best at Mid, following ADC/Top. If I get mid, It depends on how much ganks I get. I get ganks = get ahead and snow ball team :)
